title: SET_CAM_CONTROLS_MINI_MAP_HEADING
content:
0x661B5C8654ADD8250xE1A0B2F1// SetCamControlsMiniMapHeading
void SET_CAM_CONTROLS_MINI_MAP_HEADING(Cam cam, BOOL toggle);Parameters:cam: Cam handle returned by CREATE_CAMtoggle: Whether or not this camera should control the minimap heading.Makes the minimap follow a scripted camera's rotation instead of the gameplay cam.
codeBlocks:
// SetCamControlsMiniMapHeading
void SET_CAM_CONTROLS_MINI_MAP_HEADING(Cam cam, BOOL toggle);

-- Example usage for SET_CAM_CONTROLS_MINI_MAP_HEADING
SetCamControlsMiniMapHeading(0, false)
